title: Film-Noir | I'll See You in Hell (1960) directed by Piero Regnoli | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Film-Noir | I'll See You in Hell (1960) directed by Piero Regnoli | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
Haunted by greed, their heist turns into a nightmare!
A trio of criminals successfully execute a daring diamond robbery. Tensions rise at their hideout in a wilderness cabin when a mysterious woman arrives, and the surviving gang members become increasingly paranoid, believing their deceased comrade is haunting them.

Original title: Ti aspetterò all’inferno (1960) AKA: I'll See You in Hell 

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/oydhhLp3OEg


This film has English audio and is subtitled in many languages.

Director: Piero Regnoli
Writers: Arpad DeRiso, Dario Ferra, Piero Regnoli
Stars: Eva Bartok, John Drew Barrymore, Massimo Serato
Genres: Colorized, Italian Cinema, Crime, Drama, Thriller, Film-noir


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles).
01:14 Mystery and suspense unfold as a group navigates through a series of criminal activities and alibis.
12:25 A tale of betrayal and greed unfolds as a group of individuals embark on a dangerous journey for diamonds.
25:21 A chance encounter leads to a mysterious woman seeking shelter in a small town, sparking tension and intrigue.
29:25 Encounter between two individuals leads to a mysterious exchange and discussion about a past incident in a stormy night.
52:08 Betrayal, greed, and escape plans unravel in a criminal underworld, leading to tension and confrontation.
54:15 Tense conversation about sharing diamonds and trust issues.
1:16:39 A tale of revenge unfolds as a woman seeks justice for her husband's murder involving diamonds and deception.
